example.metadescription: KoolSlideMenu is very Easy-to-Use PHP Slide Menu. Based on Semantic rendering, Advanced CSS together with natural Sliding effect, KoolSlideMenu is Super Fast in rendering, Highly Appearance-Customizable and Elegant Behaviors, all making it stand out to be Excellent Choice for your Site Navigation.
example.description: KoolSlideMenu supports keeping only one menu open at a time. To enable this feature, you need to set singleExpand of KooLSlideMenu's instance to true.
